text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Entrusted to gods supreme, may our ancient path 
flourish, lasting for ages hereafter ——

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
O mighty and revered three pillars, witness my dance till its end. 
Draw near, draw near, heed the resolve set in my heart.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Proud and noble spirits, swaying gracefully, 
swayed by flame. Rage throughout heaven 
and earth, burn bright, lead us to prosperity.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: —— I am chronicler of tale, I am successor of legacy.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Ah～～～ It's prime eating season… Oh, wait, isn't the Festival of Illustrious Equines coming up? Wonder what's on the agenda this year.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Aren't responsibilities for the various performances rotated 
between the different horsegirl communities? I'm curious if 
Tracen Academy has received its assignments yet～

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Appointment! You five have been selected to perform in the Votive Stage Play at this year's Festival of Illustrious Equines!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: —— Tokai Teio! Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
—— Kawakami Princess! King Halo! 
Haru Urara! Congratulations!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Whaaat!? Meee, in the Votive Stage Play!? 
… What exactly is this "Votive Stage Play"?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Vo-ti-ve, vo-te… Voting? Are they going 
to choose who the best actress was!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Why would you think that! It means offering in devotion! 
This is a sacred ceremony of the Festival of Illustrious Equines! 
…… So, this year Tracen Academy is in charge of it?

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Affirmative! The Votive Stage Play is a play offered to the three 
goddesses! A traditional ceremonial performance art, enacting 
horsegirl folklore passed down from ancient times!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text:
Wow～! Sounds like a prestigious honor! If I recall correctly, 
aren't performers for the Votive Stage Play chosen through 
some sort of divination process?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm. Choosing me, huh? Seems the gods have good taste! 
Hehe～ We gotta go brag to Prez about this♪

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
There's also a preparation camp coming up for this stage play! 
High expectations! As representatives of Tracen Academy, 
I hope you'll dedicate yourselves to the task!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text:
Prez! Guess what～～!! 
President, you've got to hear this～～!!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text:
<color=#ff99d0>I'm gonna be in the Votive Stage Play at the festival!! </color> 
<color=#f5cd47>I've been chosen for the Votive Stage Play at the festival!!</color>

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Oh boy～ The president sure laughed at us.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Now that I think about it, it's obvious that Prez would know 
about us being chosen. The student council is always involved 
in organizing the Festival of Illustrious Equines, of course.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
But still, Prez said she's looking forward to it! If I nail this, 
I bet she'll start seeing me in a new light!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! Even though I don't know exactly what we'll 
be doing yet, I want to show something really amazing 
and totally surprise the president!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Let's gooo!!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Preparation camp sounds fun～! I wonder 
what kind of play we'll be performing??

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Remember, it's not just any play; it's a sacred ceremony of 
high standing. The performance varies each year, so we can't 
be sure what we're in for… But we've got to take it seriously.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
High standing… Whooa, that really pumps me up! 
Let's do this with elegance and grace! Knock it out of the ——

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Wait, does that mean I'll be sharing 
the stage with Madam King…?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
? Yes, that's right. 
A worthy first-class stage, for us to ——

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
—— Whaaat!? S-Sharing the stage with Madam King, together!? 
Is that really happening!?!?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Madam King! I'll give it everything I've got! 
With all my heart!! Full throttle!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Uh, yes, let's do our best…?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Sharing the stage… with Madam King……! Hmhmhm～♪ Hmhmhm～～♪

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Kawakami looks excited, doesn't she!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……… I wonder if she's really up for it.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Training camp, training camp～ La-dee-da～♪ 
Finally, tomorrow, wa-ha-ha～! I'm so excited!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Goodness, it's not like we're going on a vacation, you know…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
We've been given a very honorable task. We need to stay 
focused and make sure we do justice to our roles.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
As a first-class horsegirl, I must deliver a first-class 
rendition of this "Votive Stage Play"……!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: ……… You're really fired up, aren't you, King!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
…… Absolutely. We need to get to bed early tonight to 
prep for tomorrow. Let's hurry and finish packing.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Roger that! Clothes and～ my hug pillow～… 
Oh, should I bring playing cards too? 
It'll be fun to play together!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I told you, it's not a vacation!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Wooow, this is where we're having our training camp!! I'm so psyched, let's do thiiiiii—ughuh! uaghah!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Tsuru, you and your sudden sprints～! 
Here, have some water.

—— Hehe, what a lively group. 
Welcome, Tracen Academy attendees.

text_block_list.name: Votive Play Instructor
text_block_list.text:
I'm with the Horsegirl Ritual Arts Association, and I will 
be serving as your instructor for this preparation camp. 
I look forward to working with you all.

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: We look forward to being under your care!!
